Package universum.studios.android.fragment

Provides base and common Fragment implementations that may be used in an Android application as base classes for a specific fragment implementations.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BackPressWatcher
    The BackPressWatcher interface specifies one callback that may be used to dispatch a back button press event to a watcher that implements this interface.
    ViewClickWatcher
    The ViewClickWatcher interface specifies one callback that may be used to dispatch a view click event to a watcher that implements this interface.
    WebFragment.OnWebContentLoadingListener
    Simple listener for WebFragment with callbacks fired whenever loading process of a specific web url was started/finished.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionBarDelegate
    ActionBarDelegate is used to wrap an instance of ActionBar or ActionBar in order to hide some implementation details when using ActionBar within fragments.
    ActionBarFragment
    A BaseFragment implementation that provides API allowing to access an instance of ActionBar directly from an implementation of this class.
    ActionBarFragment.ActionModeCallback
    A ActionMode.Callback basic implementation for ActionBarFragment that may be used to simplify action mode management within an implementation of such a fragment.
    ActivityDelegate
    ActivityDelegate is used to wrap an instance of Activity in order to hide some implementation details when using Activity context within fragments.
    BaseFragment
    A Fragment implementation designed to provide extended API and logic that is useful almost every time you need to implement your desired fragment.
    FragmentsConfig
    Configuration options for the Fragments library.
    WebFragment
    An ActionBarFragment implementation that allows to show a web content within a WebView.
    WebFragment.WebOptions
    Simple class specifying options for WebFragment like WebFragment.WebOptions.content(String) WebFragment.WebOptions.javaScriptEnabled(boolean).
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    WebFragment.ContentType
    Defines an annotation for determining set of allowed content type flags for WebFragment.onLoadContent(String, int) method.

Package universum.studios.android.fragment Description

Provides base and common Fragment implementations that may be used in an Android application as base classes for a specific fragment implementations.
Author:
Martin Albedinsky
